first_benefit.heading: Versatile Workspace
first_benefit.description: The tool offers a virtual workspace where users can create and organize multiple worktables, each dedicated to a specific module or concept.

second_benefit.heading: Visual Editing
second_benefit.description: Drag and drop elements, components, and visual assets onto the artboard. This allows for the visual creation and editing of designs without the need to write code.

third_benefit.heading: Diagrams and Flows
third_benefit.description: It allows users to create flowcharts, process diagrams, and other types of visual representations to plan and communicate the logic and structure of modules.
